profile.title: User Profile.
profile.description: Provide a unique profile name for this data. Typically this is the name of the profile you selected in the previous step.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration
reauth_confirm.description: The "{profile}" profile needs to be re-authenticated in order to continue receiving Withings data.

abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})

data.body_measurement: Activate sensors related to body measurements
